import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Logo } from '../components/Logo'; export function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [roomId, setRoomId] = useState(''); const [showCreateModal, setShowCreateModal] = useState(false); const [createRoomForm, setCreateRoomForm] = useState({ username: '', teamName: '', maxParticipants: 10 }); const handleCreateRoom = () => { setShowCreateModal(true); }; const handleCreateRoomSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); const newRoomId = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8).toUpperCase(); navigate(`/room/${newRoomId}`, { state: { roomId: newRoomId, username: createRoomForm.username, teamName: createRoomForm.teamName, maxParticipants: createRoomForm.maxParticipants, isHost: true } }); }; const handleJoinRoom = () => { if (roomId.trim()) { navigate('/join', { state: { roomId: roomId.trim().toUpperCase(), isHost: false } }); } }; return (

Scrum Poker

setCreateRoomForm(prev => ({ ...prev, username: e.target.value }))} className="mt-1 block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500" placeholder="İsminizi girin" />
setCreateRoomForm(prev => ({ ...prev, teamName: e.target.value }))} className="mt-1 block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500" placeholder="Ekip adını girin" />
setCreateRoomForm(prev => ({ ...prev, maxParticipants: parseInt(e.target.value) || 2 }))} className="mt-1 block w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500" />
)}
); }
